text: One Little Indian is a 1973 American family Western comedy movie directed by Bernard McEveety and starring James Garner, Vera Miles, Pat Hingle, Morgan Woodward, Jodie Foster, Robert Pine, Bruce Glover and Andrew Prine. It was distributed by Walt Disney Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:1973 comedy movies Category:American family movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American comedy movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Disney movies Category:Movies about mammals Category:Movies composed by Jerry Goldsmith Category:Movies about Native Americans
title: One Little Indian (movie)
